change.changenote: Section 1 (1) (n) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 29/2010, effective January 21, 2010.

paragraph.paragraphtext: the Chief and Councillors of Alexis Creek First Nations, Chilanko Forks, British Columbia;

change.changenote: Section 1 (1) (s) was added by BC Reg 168/2014, effective September 5, 2014.
Section 1 (1) (t) and (u) were added by BC Reg 102/2016, effective May 3, 2016.
Section 1 (2) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 102/2016, effective May 3, 2016.

bcl:subsection.bcl:text: For the purposes of subsection (1), the persons designated under subsection (1) (c) to (r) are the individuals who, from time to time, hold the position or have the membership referred to in that subsection.
